questions.questionTitle: What problem does the man have?
anwers: He ordered from the wrong store.
He did not submit an invoice.

questions.questionTitle: What was the purpose of the memo?
anwers: To remind employees to spend less
To announce a change in vendors
To explain how to submit invoices
To ask for a shopping preference

script:
� Michael, I can't accept this invoice from the Office Place store. Didn't you see the memo last week? We are using Office Essentials now instead of Office Place.
� Really? No, I didn't see the memo. I was in Miami, and when I got back on Monday I was swamped with work. It must be on my desk somewhere.
� OK. Is it too late to cancel the order with Office Place? If so, great. If not, I'll explain the situation to accounting.
� Thanks, Darlene. I'll check it out.
